body.p: Born in Woodford County, Kentucky, son of Lewis Turner Payne and Sarah Ann. Raised in Scott County, Kentucky. A Private in the Second Kentucky Infantry Regiment. Captured as prisoner of war. Released in a prisoner exchange, spring 1865. Then promoted to Lieutenant, 5th Kentucky Cavalry. Fought for the Confederacy.
